html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-04132015-04-01,  ,  ,  AANDC, 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectSetting apart lands for the use and benefit of the Lax Kw'alaams Indian Band and the Metlakatla Indian Band in British Columbia
PrecisOrder setting apart lands for the use and benefit of the Lax Kw’alaams Indian Band and Metlakatla Indian Band as follows: (1) 4,114 hectares (10,166 acres) as TSIMPSEAN INDIAN RESERVE No. 2A; (2) 6.19 hectares (15.30 acres) as POINT VEITCH INDIAN RESERVE No. 7; and (3) 2.10 hectares (5.19 acres) as an addition to KHYEX INDIAN RESERVE No. 8. All lands are located in the Skeena-Queen Charlotte Regional District, British Columbia.
AttachmentsAttachment
